header.rec_loc: ANON’s bedroom in university halls, Lancaster University
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Dropping out of university, childhood, dirty shoes, name origins
header.activity: Flatmates talking about university problems and childhood

they expect all of it back erm and I dunno about the fees or

no no I literally can't so what they'd have to do is they'd have to do what I did last year when I didn't have enough money and they just take it out of the bank like five pounds a month or something but my mum's taken on that from last year and she still has it like she's still paying five pounds a month
to pay off last year's money and I can't ask her to do it again
she's skint you know? we're not in a good financial situation to deal with this and I would feel like just horrendous you know cos it would be a horrendous thing to do like to

they expect like this transformation like

what it can make you feel
